I have a few great new opportunities for C Programmers!
If you want to work on new projects and have an opportunity to work for one of the top global companies in the security space, get in touch with me via email.

I am recruiting for a major IT project to assist in the relief efforts in Puerto Rico and the US Virgin Islands.  We are in need of 7 PC Technicians and 5 Systems Administrators.  Secret clearances and a DoD 8570 Level 1 Certification are required.  Accommodations provided.  ALL expenses paid, and a 10k completion bonus is on the table on top of the very competitive rate that we can offer.  Please contact me at rlizardo@softworldinc.com for more information.  If this is not for you, referrals are welcome!

Today,  I start working for Bose Corporation again. I’m beyond excited to take on another role at this company and meet new challenges head on. I’m grateful to many people for their support and guidance, and thankful for the new relationships I made at my previous job. I guess my passion for audio outweighed my passion for computers.

Softworld has developed expertise across five distinct staffing and consulting practices over the past 20 years.Technology ServicesSoftworld’s technology staffing team works to provide clients with the right contract and direct hire professionals that fit their particular needs. Full Lifecycle Staffing for Application Development, Data Management, Systems and Infrastructure, and Project ManagementClinical and BiometricsSoftworld’s Clinical and Biometrics practice provides the needed expertise and experts to help pharmaceutical, biotechnological and medical device companies bring products to market in a safe, compliant and timely manner. We understand the speed in which you need to move and have the right clinical and biometrics professionals you need whether you work with us through a staffing, project based or functional service provider approach. EngineeringOur Engineering team specializes in specific industries in order to build deeper networks and better qualify each candidate. We offer high level support in a wide array of areas with specific expertise in Mechanical, Electrical, Manufacturing, Quality, Civil, Structural, Architectural, and Design ServicesGovernmentWorking across Federal Law Enforcement, Defense, Military, State and Federal departments, we are able to employ and place professionals with various government clearances. We partner with many 8(a) firms and government contractors as well as work through the GSA schedule. BankingSoftworld's Banking Practice delivers strategic consulting services for high level technology initiatives as well as IT staffing for projects. We have a deep understanding of the banking industry issues, trends and technologies that are important to you.

We work closely with people to create quality relationships and understand the technology, working environment and challenges they are looking for to move their career forward. We work hard to become experts in understanding the ever-changing skills and attributes necessary to place top level candidates in their respective fields. Our client base ranges from Fortune 50 Companies to well-funded startups who all recognize the benefits of our unique talent acquisition process and the competitive advantages that our service provides.The DAVIS Companies is a preferred source for employment and Talent Advisory Services, specializing in contract, contract-to-hire and direct hire staffing for Finance & Accounting, IT & Engineering and Skilled Manufacturing personnel.  With corporate headquarters in Marlborough, MA and offices in New Hampshire, New Jersey, Minnesota and Georgia, we put great people to work in great companies.

JCSI is a recruitment consulting firm leveraging social media networking and passive candidate research to build a qualified candidate pool for all your immediate and future hiring needs. Our staffing consultants act as a seamless supplement to your existing team providing comprehensive sourcing, screening and applicant communication services. The best candidates aren't always the ones responding to your ads, they may be hard at work helping your competitors succeed. JCSI specializes in identifying the best passive candidates, cultivating relationships that communicate the value of a career with your company, and delivering the right candidates to you at the right time. Unlike agencies, we do not charge contingency fees so our unique approach delivers higher quality hires to you faster at lower costs.

I was moved into a management position to work on the operations side of the business and at that point, Andrew became one of my direct reports.  During that time that I managed Andrew, I was continually impressed by his desire to take on more work.  He always requested additional tasks to improve his overall skillset or to help the company in some way.As a recruiter, Andrew's easy and genuine personality made it possible for him to connect with many different candidates.  These connections attributed to much of Andrew's overall success in providing our clients with high-quality candidates who had the exact skills our clients were looking for.

I was fortunate enough to cross paths with Mr. Jones in the fall of 2008. A good-natured man, Andrew comes as advertised. His quick and witty actions allow him to handle many, if not all, scenarios that are put in his direction. While others may falter under the pressures of corporate America, Andrew uses these as motivation, seeking to ask the ever important  question of "Why?" when faced with hardships. Exhibiting the cool and collected mentality of a seasoned veteran of the corporate world, Andrew never finds himself in a sitatuation that falls out of control of his fingertips. I fully recommend Andrew's expertise to anyone that crosses paths with him in the same fashion that I have had to the pleasure to. .
